member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA
member.summary: Contains information about the class, title, owner, location, and size of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.szClass
member.summary: The name of the window class of the MDI child window. The class name must have been registered by a previous call to the function.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.szTitle
member.summary: The title of the MDI child window. The system displays the title in the child window's title bar.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.hOwner
member.summary: A handle to the instance of the application creating the MDI client window.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.x
member.summary: The initial horizontal position, in client coordinates, of the MDI child window. If this member is CW_USEDEFAULT, the MDI child window is assigned the default horizontal position.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.y
member.summary: The initial vertical position, in client coordinates, of the MDI child window. If this member is CW_USEDEFAULT, the MDI child window is assigned the default vertical position.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.cx
member.summary: The initial width, in device units, of the MDI child window. If this member is CW_USEDEFAULT, the MDI child window is assigned the default width.

member.name: MDICREATESTRUCTA.cy
member.summary: The initial height, in device units, of the MDI child window. If this member is set to CW_USEDEFAULT, the MDI child window is assigned the default height.

summary.para: The style of the MDI child window. If the MDI client window was created with the MDIS_ALLCHILDSTYLES window style, this member can be any combination of the window styles listed in the Window Styles page. Otherwise, this member can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: Creates an MDI child window that is initially minimized.
Creates an MDI child window that is initially maximized.
Creates an MDI child window that has a horizontal scroll bar.
Creates an MDI child window that has a vertical scroll bar.
